0.2.0.en: fixed an error resulting from deleting the device; added flow card trigger charging finished

0.2.1.en: fixed the flow card trigger charging finished; added flow card trigger car car_connected; added flow card trigger car charging

0.2.3.en: added trigger when unplugging a plugged car

0.3.0.en: added action to change charging amps; added action to allow charging; added action to disallow charging; added condition is charging; added condition charging finished

0.3.2.en: Homey App Store compliancy issues fixed

0.3.3.en: Homey App Store compliancy issues fixed II

0.3.4.en: Added energy total variable; fixed changing on-off values not triggering when changing from homey by adding hidden old_onoff

0.3.6.en: Few minor fixes. Added Charging allowed, Car Plugged conditions and Status changed trigger.

1.0.1.en: Fixed a specific 1 phase connection situation where the voltage could become negative

1.1.0.en: Deprecation notice - Start using the new app supporting SDK3 and new go-e APIv2 features.

1.1.1.en: Deprecation notice to point to he new app
